verbs.description: hbo [ARG0: talk show host john oliver] [V: accuses] [ARG1: texas attorney general ken paxton] [ARG2: of bigotry attorney general ken paxton] was the subject of several insults on hbo last week tonight show sunday with host john oliver accusing texas’ top attorney of bigotry for saying an obama - era transgender bathroom policy would have allowed men to change their gender for a day to access the girls’ restroom or locker room suing the federal government became a point of pride for republican attorneys general during the obama administration oliver said holding up former attorney general now - gov greg abbott and paxton as examples attorney obama administration northeastern illinois university nashville nashville post andrea zelinski securities fraud hbo ken paxton attorney general university of illinois talk show illinois texas attorney general federal government john oliver greg abbott austin texas
